reference.title: GetLoggingBlock : To get a particular Logging Block

section.title: Synopsis
section.p: HRESULT GetLoggingBlock([in] USHORT BlockIndex, [out] SLOGGINGBLOCK_USR* psLoggingBlock);

section.title: Description
section.p: This function gets a particular logging block

section.title: Inputs
section.p: [in] USHORT BlockIndex - The zero based logging block index.
[out] SLOGGINGBLOCK_USR* psLoggingBlock - return pointer to Logging block.

refbody.section: HRESULT hResult = m_IApplication->GetLoggingBlock(0,psLoggingBlock)//Gets pointer to first logging block.
